Others: Dyson Daniels denied making a gun gesture during a 3-pointer in front of the New Orleans Pelicans' bench.
Daniels explained his gesture as a way to inform his teammates of the value of the points scored.
Pelicans players requested a technical foul for Daniels' unsportsmanlike conduct, but it was not awarded.
Larry Nance Jr. also had some interactions with the Pelicans bench, including a kiss after a 3-pointer.
The game included a flagrant foul involving Hawks guard Garrison Matthews and Pelicans guard Jose Alvarado.
